welcomeContent:
On this page, you can view a list of all the records under the record type you selected, and their status.

You can filter existing records and create new ones, as well as duplicate, edit or delete a record.
filtersContent: Use these filters to see a list of all records, published, draft or records pending approval.
KeywordContent: Search the list by typing a word of your choice.
addingContent: Click on the “Add New” button to start creating a new record.
duplicateContent: Click here to create a duplicate of the existing record.
editContent: Click here to edit an existing record.
needHelpContent: Click here to access contextual help where you can find more information related to this page.
needMoreHelpContent: Us the Chat feature to message us for additional support.
